title: New potato salad with Gorgonzola and walnuts
ingredients: ['60g walnuts', '12 small new potatoes, halved', '1 large Granny Smith apple - halved, cored and thinly sliced', '1 small red onion, halved and thinly sliced', '85g crumbled Gorgonzola cheese', '60ml extra-virgin olive oil', '60ml Champagne vinegar, or as needed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil', 'salt to taste', 'white pepper to taste']
